title: Andrzej Strejlau
text:
Andrzej Michał Strejlau (born February 19, 1940) is a retired <a href="Poland">Polish</a> <a href="football%20%28soccer%29">football</a> and <a href="handball">handball</a> player.
In 1989–1993 he was a coach of <a href="Poland%20national%20football%20team">Poland national football team</a>. He also coached many teams from different parts of the world (<a href="China">China</a>, <a href="Iceland">Iceland</a>, <a href="Greece">Greece</a>)
He has coached <a href="Poland%20national%20under-21%20football%20team">Poland U-21</a>, <a href="Legia%20Warszawa">Legia Warszawa</a>, <a href="Zag%C5%82%C4%99bie%20Sosnowiec">Zagłębie Sosnowiec</a>, <a href="Knattspyrnuf%C3%A9lagi%C3%B0%20Fram">Knattspyrnufélagið Fram</a>, <a href="Larissa%20F.C.">Larissa</a>, and <a href="Zag%C5%82%C4%99bie%20Lubin">Zagłębie Lubin</a>.
He was later a member of the suspended board of <a href="PZPN">PZPN</a>.
